original_text: Then he put the body in a large hole in a rock. He had made the hole for his own body when he died. After he put Jesus' body there, he rolled a very big stone across the front of the hole to shut it. Then he went away.
korean_text: 바위 속에 판 자기 새 무덤에 넣어 두고 큰 돌을 굴려 무덤 문에 놓고 가니

sentences.original_text: Then he put the body in a large hole in a rock.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 시체를 바위에 있는 큰 구멍에 넣었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He had made the hole for his own body when he died.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 죽을 때 자신의 시체를 위해 그 구멍을 만들어 두었습니다.

sentences.original_text: After he put Jesus' body there,
he rolled a very big stone across the front of the hole to shut it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 구멍 앞에 아주 큰 돌을 굴려서 그것을 닫았습니다.
